summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 31, 2019. It records inmate census counts for various housing units, totaling 760 inmates. The document is part of the prison's administrative records.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: A routine official inmate census was conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total of 760 inmates across multiple housing units.

keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated July 31, 2019.
It records an inmate census at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The total inmate count recorded was 760 across various housing units.
The document is an administrative prison record showing routine operations.
No specific individuals are named in this document.
